Uses of Class
com.appglu.AppGluRestClientException

Packages that use AppGluRestClientException
com.appglu The main package of AppGlu's Java Client SDK.
Contain interfaces to describe all available operations and APIs as well as model objects to be used by these operations. 
com.appglu.android The main package of AppGlu's Android SDK.
Contains the SDK's main class AppGlu and some utility classes to provide asynchronous execution using AsyncTask. 
com.appglu.android.sync Contains the Sync API implementation for Android.
The Sync API is used to synchronize the data in your local SQLite tables with the AppGlu server.
 
com.appglu.impl Contain the implementation of interfaces and private objects only to be used internally. 
 

Uses of AppGluRestClientException in com.appglu
 

Subclasses of AppGluRestClientException in com.appglu
 class AppGluHttpClientException
          Happens when an HTTP status error of the client series is received (anything between 400 and 499).
 class AppGluHttpInternalServerErrorException
          Represents an HTTP status error code of 500 (Generic Server Error).
 class AppGluHttpInvalidUserSignupException
          Happens when UserOperations.signup(User) does not succeed.
That can be because the user already existed or maybe the password is weak.
 class AppGluHttpNotFoundException
          Happens when the HTTP status error 400 is received.
 class AppGluHttpServerException
          Happens when an HTTP status error of the server series is received (anything between 500 and 599).
 class AppGluHttpStatusCodeException
          Happens when an HTTP status error of the client or server series is received (anything between 400-499 or 500-599).
 class AppGluHttpUserUnauthorizedException
          Happens when UserOperations.login(String, String) does not succeed because either the login or the password does not match.
 class RowMapperException
          Exception that can happen when mapping a Row object using a implementation of RowMapper.
 class RowMapperTypeConversionException
          Happens when trying to convert a column value of a Row class to a incorrect type.
For example, if the column type is String and you try to convert it to Integer using Row.getInt(String).
 class UserSessionPersistenceException
          Happens when there is a problem saving or retrieving the User from a UserSessionPersistence implementation.
 

Methods in com.appglu that return AppGluRestClientException
 AppGluRestClientException ExceptionWrapper.getRestClientException()
           
 

Methods in com.appglu that throw AppGluRestClientException
 TableChanges SyncOperations.changesForTable(String tableName, long version)
          The returned TableChanges will contain rows if the server version of the table is higher that the local one.
 List<TableChanges> SyncOperations.changesForTables(List<TableVersion> tables)
          Return a list of TableChanges, one for each specified TableVersion.
For each TableChanges returned, it will contain rows if the server version of that table is higher that the local one.
Since the response can be very large, to consume less memory, the use of SyncOperations.changesForTables(List, TableChangesCallback) may be more appropriate.
 void SyncOperations.changesForTables(List<TableVersion> tables, TableChangesCallback tableChangesCallback)
          Returns the same result as SyncOperations.changesForTables(List).
 void SyncOperations.changesForTables(TableChangesCallback tableChangesCallback, TableVersion... tables)
          Returns the same result as SyncOperations.changesForTables(TableVersion...).
 List<TableChanges> SyncOperations.changesForTables(TableVersion... tables)
          Return a list of TableChanges, one for each specified TableVersion.
For each TableChanges returned, it will contain rows if the server version of that table is higher that the local one.
Since the response can be very large, to consume less memory, the use of SyncOperations.changesForTables(TableChangesCallback, TableVersion...) may be more appropriate.
 Object CrudOperations.create(String tableName, Row row)
          Creates a new row for the specified table.
 boolean CrudOperations.delete(String tableName, Object id)
          Deletes a row for the specified table where the primary key matches the one passed as argument.
 void SyncOperations.downloadChangesForTables(InputStreamCallback inputStreamCallback, TableVersion... tables)
          Returns the same result as SyncOperations.changesForTables(TableVersion...).
 void SyncOperations.downloadChangesForTables(List<TableVersion> tables, InputStreamCallback inputStreamCallback)
          Returns the same result as SyncOperations.changesForTables(List).
 AuthenticationResult UserOperations.login(String username, String password)
          Logs in a previously signed up User if the credentials are correct.
If the log in succeeds, the User will be saved using a UserSessionPersistence implementation.
 boolean UserOperations.logout()
          Removes the logged in user from the UserSessionPersistence implementation.
 Row CrudOperations.read(String tableName, Object id)
          Search the table for the specified primary key value and return the Row or return null if not found.
 Row CrudOperations.read(String tableName, Object id, boolean expandRelationships)
          Search the table for the specified primary key value and return the Row or return null if not found.
 Rows CrudOperations.readAll(String tableName)
          Read all Rows of the specified table.
 Rows CrudOperations.readAll(String tableName, boolean expandRelationships)
          Read all Rows of the specified table.
 Rows CrudOperations.readAll(String tableName, boolean expandRelationships, ReadAllFilterArguments arguments)
          Read Rows of the specified table following the defined filter arguments.
 Map<String,Object> UserOperations.readData()
          Returns custom user data previously saved to AppGlu using UserOperations.writeData(Map).
 Device PushOperations.readDevice(String token)
          Return more information about a specific device token.
 void UserOperations.refreshUserProfile()
          Calls the REST API to refresh the User object saved using a UserSessionPersistence implementation.
 void PushOperations.registerDevice(Device device)
          Register a device installation, making it eligible to receive push notifications.
 boolean PushOperations.removeDevice(String token)
          Unregister a device identified by his token.
 QueryResult SavedQueriesOperations.runQuery(String queryName)
          Execute a query on the server side identified by queryName and return the result.
You will first have to create the query using AppGlu's dash board web-site and give it a name.
 QueryResult SavedQueriesOperations.runQuery(String queryName, QueryParams params)
          Execute a query on the server side identified by queryName and return the result.
You will first have to create the query using AppGlu's dash board web-site and give it a name.
 AuthenticationResult UserOperations.signup(User user)
          Signs up a new User for your mobile application.
If the sign up succeeds, the User will be saved using a UserSessionPersistence implementation.
 void StorageOperations.streamStorageFile(StorageFile file, InputStreamCallback inputStreamCallback)
          Download a file from a URL specified in file.getUrl() and gives the stream back to InputStreamCallback.doWithInputStream(java.io.InputStream).
 boolean StorageOperations.streamStorageFileIfModifiedSince(StorageFile file, InputStreamCallback inputStreamCallback)
          Will use file.getLastModified() to add a If-Modified-Since header.
If the file was not modified since, then it will return false and InputStreamCallback.doWithInputStream(java.io.InputStream) will not be called.
 boolean StorageOperations.streamStorageFileIfNoneMatch(StorageFile file, InputStreamCallback inputStreamCallback)
          Will use file.getETag() to add a If-None-Match header.
If the eTag matches with the server, then it will return false and InputStreamCallback.doWithInputStream(java.io.InputStream) will not be called.
 boolean CrudOperations.update(String tableName, Object id, Row row)
          Updates a row for the specified table where the primary key matches the one passed as argument.
 void AnalyticsOperations.uploadSession(AnalyticsSession session)
          Uploads a single session to AppGlu.
 void AnalyticsOperations.uploadSessions(AnalyticsSession... sessions)
          Uploads a list of sessions to AppGlu.
 void AnalyticsOperations.uploadSessions(List<AnalyticsSession> sessions)
          Uploads a list of sessions to AppGlu.
 List<TableVersion> SyncOperations.versionsForTables(List<String> tables)
          Return the current server table version for the specified table names.
 List<TableVersion> SyncOperations.versionsForTables(String... tables)
          Return the current server table version for the specified table names.
 void UserOperations.writeData(Map<String,Object> data)
          Saves custom user data to AppGlu.

 boolean StorageTemplate.streamStorageFileIfModifiedSince(StorageFile file, InputStreamCallback inputStreamCallback)
